job.title: Data Scientist - Entry Level
job.description: pMeyocks is growing thanks to the great work of our talented and dedicated team and were looking for a data scientist to join us ppnbspppstrongWhat You Would Do at MeyocksstrongppAs an entry  level data scientist you would be responsible for assisting in the entire lifespan of Meyocks data tech stack Personal growth opportunity to develop skills in SQL R and Python to better assist in the maintenance of the data tech stack as well as assisting in data science projects ppnbspppYou would learn client strategy and help drive decisions about what data to collect as well as how to use it effectively You would develop a deep understanding of the nuances and limitations of various data sources You would utilize languages such as SQL Python and R to develop and maintain ETL pipelines You would work with the team to foster custom solutions to meet our clients needsppnbspppYou would ensure fellow team members had proper access to data You would act as an administrator in the visualization platform and become an expert in the intricacies of that visualization tool You would become experienced in data security governance and privacyppnbspppYou would create reports and make trends and insights visual for consumption by internal team members and clients alike You would find and use various technologies and techniques to roll up detailed data into meaningful information assist in setting up reporting systems to make information available on a selfservice basis and create dashboards in Tableau that make trends and insights easy to seeppnbspppstrongDesired Skills and ExperiencestrongpulliDegree in data science computer science or other quantitative disciplineliliAbility to quickly learn new technology and apply it to achieve business objectivesliliWillingness to learn new skills and continual improveliliSolid organizational and project management skillsliliFocus on accuracy and attention to detailliliMust be a selfstarter quick learner intuitive and proactiveliliExperience with a similar role in a professional environment preferredliliProficient with SQL and one or more of the following Python R or JulialiliExperience in a visualization tool like Tableau preferredliliPrefer candidate in the Des Moines Iowa area but open to telecommuting options US locations only for highly qualified candidatesliulpnbspppstrongAbout Meyocks strongppMeyocks based in West Des Moines Iowa is a branding and marketing agency that shapes marketplace meaning for food agricultural health and mentor brands We help brands that nourish and nurture mean morep
